title: Electronic Signatures – 21 CFR Part 11
text: Electronic signatures must be unique to one individual, verified, and linked to their records. See 21 CFR Part 11 §§11.100–11.200.

title: EU GMP Annex 11 – Validation
text: Computerised systems should be validated with a level of effort proportionate to risk and complexity. Maintain a validation plan, traceability, and evidence.

title: ICH E6(R3) – Principles
text: Focus on participant safety, data integrity, quality by design, and proportionate processes. Emphasize critical-to-quality factors and risk-proportionate controls.

title: Data Integrity – ALCOA+
text: Attributable, Legible, Contemporaneous, Original, Accurate (+Complete, Consistent, Enduring, Available). Apply to both paper and electronic records.
